meanings.definition: The quality or state of being fluffy.
meanings.sent1: The fluffinesses of the clouds made them look like cotton candy.
meanings.sent2: I love the fluffinesses of my favorite teddy bear.
meanings.sent3: The kitten's playful fluffinesses always bring a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: Her hair had a fluffinesses that reminded me of a soft cloud.
meanings.sent5: The fluffinesses of the pillow made it perfect for a cozy nap.

meanings.definition: The softness or lightness of a fluffy texture.
meanings.sent1: The fluffinesses of the blanket kept me warm all night.
meanings.sent2: The fluffinesses of the marshmallows made them irresistible for toasting.
meanings.sent3: The fluffinesses of the cake made it melt in my mouth.
meanings.sent4: Her scarf had a fluffinesses that felt like a gentle hug.
meanings.sent5: The fluffinesses of the clouds made them float effortlessly in the sky.
